transcript: Hello, this is Irene here. So I would like to have all of the information I have in the system and also the most updated I have.

result.user_query: Hello, this is Irene here. So I would like to have all of the information I have in the system and also the most updated I have.
result.plan: The user, Irene, is requesting all information available in the system and the most updated information. Since the user did not specify a product type or category, we will perform a broad search in our 2020 product catalog and also search the web for the latest information.

web_results.title: I would like more information or I would like to get more information?
web_results.snippet: This phrase implies a specific action of obtaining the information desired. It adds a sense of actively seeking out the information. Show examples from the web [+] Last updated: November 02, 2024 · I would like to get more information on the ...

web_results.title: 10 Other Ways to Say "Here Is the Information You Requested"
web_results.snippet: “All the information” implies you did everything you could to find the information someone needed. It shows you worked hard and did your due diligence before responding to their email to answer their request.

web_results.title: 10 Alternative Phrases for "Here Is the Info You Asked For"
web_results.snippet: The phrase “all the information” suggests that you’ve thoroughly researched and gathered everything necessary to address someone’s inquiry. It reflects your commitment to diligence and effort in providing a comprehensive response to their email. This example will provide you with a clearer understanding of the concept. ... This is all the information you have asked for. I looked through the system and compiled it into one list. ... “Here’s the information you requested:” is a courteous way to guide someone’s attention.

web_results.title: r/sysadmin on Reddit: Company policy for Windows Hello usage
web_results.snippet: We basically copied and pasted with very minor changes the blurb here: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/security/identity-protection/hello-for-business/how-it-works#biometric-data-storage ... I would disagree with this interpretation about collection. Windows Hello collects the bio information and stores some rendition of it on the local machine, specifically the TPM chip. The collections uses Microsoft tech, which you have configured to collect data, but it's not stored on Microsoft systems, it's stored on the machine you own/control

web_results.title: word usage - A formal way to request for updated information in business email writing - English Language Learners Stack Exchange
web_results.snippet: For example, if I sent a semiannual email to my employees or customer base, asking for an update of demographic information, and I could use my database, I might make a template like this: Dear user.firstname: We have the following demographic information about you in our records: data dump If any of this information has changed, please reply to this email with updated information. The most important point here is that you can't ask people for updated information unless you have a reasonable expectation that they already know exactly what information you currently have!

result.final_answer:
Hello Irene,

It seems that our 2020 catalog did not return any relevant results for your request. However, here are some web resources that might help you gather the information you need:

- You can explore phrases and strategies for obtaining information actively at [textranch.com](https://textranch.com/c/i-would-like-more-information-or-i-would-like-to-get-more-information/).
- For alternative ways to phrase your requests for information, check out [grammarhow.com](https://grammarhow.com/other-ways-to-say-here-is-the-information-you-requested/).
- Another useful resource for phrasing and gathering comprehensive information is available at [thegrammarguru.com](https://thegrammarguru.com/10-alternative-phrases-for-here-is-the-info-you-asked-for/).

These sources provide guidance on how to effectively request and compile information, which might be useful for your needs.
